text: Ordered food on ubereats and a hour and a half later i call and they say they don't even have my order. Lady doesmt offer amy other assistance like calling their uber people ams seeing whats wrong. And it was the manager i spoke too.

text: Tried the lobster roll sandwich. Sandwich tasted great. Service was spot on today.

name: Pat The Trucker
text: My sammich tasted great. The service was excellent.  I wish they would move down south. I've been coming here for years.

name: Mat N
text: I often eat at deangelos because of their awesome chicken sandwich. By far the worst sandwich I've ever had. We asked for extra toasted bread and got soggy bread. The chicken and mushrooms were barely cooked.

name: Issamarie Principe
text: Just amazing!! The food was delicious , hot and perfect. The service was great too, they were very nice and fast. First time trying it so sad I donâ€™t live around. I would give more stars if I could ðŸ‘Œ

name: Aaron m
text: I have been to Dangelo's at many other locations and have always been a fan. This place is a very poor representation of the business. My sandwich didn't even look like a sandwich. It was drenched in sauce so the bread was soggy and lettuce and mushrooms were all falling out. It also had a tiny piece of chicken in it.

name: Haley Fiorentino
text: Had the lobster roll on my way back from Maine, absolutely delicious, and well worth it. Staff was friendly and quick.

name: Boris Carlos
text: Best steak sub I've had in years I'll be back

name: P.trainman1957 Smith
text: The food was real good. They would get five stars but everyone was just standing around

name: Benjamin Diamond
text: The Thanksgiving Dinner sub is delicious!
